attributes.action: Scrap the BBC tv licence fee
attributes.additional_details: Tv has evolved beyond recognition since the tax was introduced. A lot of people do not even watch the BBC on live broadcast or online. The BBC is not even relevant anymore, especially in the younger amongst us. Time for a rethink,
attributes.background: With the today’s news of charging over 75’s to watch live tv, now is the time to have a full review and public consultation of the value of a tv licence, in the eyes of the public.
